Reviews.Title: Great buy
Reviews.Author: Darcy Stanford
Reviews.Content: Awesome group package. Definitely worth the buy. Got it as a gift for my sister and it's a great starters package. Everything you need with the camera.

Reviews.Title: Good starter camera
Reviews.Author: Gina
Reviews.Content: It was for my 14 yr old daughter she is getting into photography and it's working out good the lenses were not as high a quality as what I had thought but good for a beginner

Reviews.Title: Great customer service
Reviews.Author: peter m smith
Reviews.Content: The camera came exactly on time and a day before Christmas. I haven't had much of an opportunity to use the camera enough to really write a meaningful review  but I did have a very satisfactory exchange with the seller. I bought the camera kit including a camera case ... Which turned out to be to small for the camera. I emailed Camata Camera and within a hour they had acknowledged my email and were sending a newer larger bag to me at no additional chargeNow that's good customer serviceSoon I will be able to give more details about the camera
